1533530.name: Pixel Heroes
1533530.description:
In a world named Uzoria lies a journey filled with adventures and exploration. Pixel Heroes brings back the traditional "grindy" RPG feeling, tag along with friends, build up your stats, take on the bigger creatures; and grow powerful together.

This free MMORPG let's you dive into a variety of different builds, Wizard, Archer, Tank or Knight. Find your true call, whether it is close- or distant combat. Create groups to benefit each other's abilities, or release your inner PVM-GOD alone. And probably die...

Features

  • Open World MMORPG, play with your friends or as a solo player.
  • Crafting, armor, weapons & potions can be crafted to become more powerful.
  • Skills, level up your skills by mining, fighting, crafting and much more.
  • AFK, train your skills while you are AFK at a reduced speed.
